aboutMe.paragraph1: I am a passionate and creative person that learns fast, is solution oriented and good at implementation. I have always been very interested in IT, especially programming and other creative work in gaming, animation and film. I have used a lot of my free time to learn and evolve in these areas. It was therefore natural for me to go to school as a computer engineer and it is amazing to work with what I love to do.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I started in early/middle 2000s by creating simple websites for personal use with HTML and CSS. This eventually got me into creating more complex websites with PHP and since 2018 I have mostly focused on building websites with React and Node.js, which is one of the things I do at

technologies.description: These are some of the texhnologies I've been working with recently

arctic.title: Developer
arctic.description1: Create internal and external websites for employees and customers
arctic.description2: Integrate internal systems with websites and batch jobs

contact.paragraph1: Feel free to contact me even though I'm not currently looking for any new opportunities.
